name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James WOLFE, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James WOLFE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Stuart Suss, Director of Appeals, West Chester, for appellant.
John J. Stanzione, Sara R. Nichols, Timothy I. Melvin, West Chester, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
537 A.2d 1370
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James WOLFE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 11, 1987.
Decided Feb. 29, 1988.
Stuart Suss, Director of Appeals, West Chester, for appellant.
John J. Stanzione, Sara R. Nichols, Timothy I. Melvin, West Chester, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
